title: 1910 Obak Box - One of the Nicest
author: canjond

posts.post_title: 1910 Obak Box - One of the Nicest
posts.post_content:
I have one of the nicest empty Obak packs for sale I've come across.  This was purchased to be part of my collection, but I recently came across a full pack, so now have the duplicate available.

Comes complete with the inner slide plus a full 1910 tax stamp (1909 series).  99% certainty this would have held a card.  Condition-wise, they don't get better!

SOLD
came today.... Jon its flawless thank you its going in the permanent collection could not be happier thanks bob
